name: SolarTech Innovations
description: Early-stage startup developing next-generation solar panel manufacturing processes with 30% improved efficiency over traditional silicon panels. Currently in pilot production phase with plans to scale to commercial manufacturing. Our technology uses advanced perovskite materials combined with traditional silicon cells to achieve higher conversion rates at lower manufacturing costs.
looking_for: Export development for renewable energy products
competitive_advantages: Experienced founding team from UNSW research

use_of_funds: Scale pilot production to commercial manufacturing
